content.html: It is frustrating that SaaS providers are still paywalling SSO/SAML behind 'Enterprise' plans 😭 SME get stuck with 2nd rate security on 'Business' tiers, as 'Enterprise' is super expensive and contains loads of otherwise irrelevant features. 👏 Make 👏 SSO 👏 Standard 👏
content.value:
It is frustrating that SaaS providers are still paywalling SSO/SAML behind 'Enterprise' plans 😭

SME get stuck with 2nd rate security on 'Business' tiers, as 'Enterprise' is super expensive and contains loads of otherwise irrelevant features. 

👏 Make 👏 SSO 👏 Standard 👏
